name: VZMacAuxiliaryStorage
desc: An object that contains information the boot loader needs for booting macOS as a guest operating system.

items.name: init(contentsOf: URL)
items.desc: Initializes an auxiliary storage object with data from the location at the URL you provide.

items.name: init(creatingStorageAt: URL, hardwareModel: VZMacHardwareModel, options: VZMacAuxiliaryStorage.InitializationOptions)
items.desc: Creates an initialized Mac auxiliary storage instance that describes a specific hardware model at a URL you specify.

items.name: struct VZMacAuxiliaryStorage.InitializationOptions
items.desc: Options you can set when creating new auxiliary storage.

items.name: var url: URL
items.desc: The URL of the auxiliary storage on the local file system.
